::Slayer::

Slayer recieves Ignatius's message, motioning for Zoe to follow him 
as he turns and heads off toward the Cybertronian Fire again.

"We're going to attack the Maximal base and then run for cover," he 
says to her, "If some of them follow, we exterminate them later on."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius starts to shake his head, Slayer was going to cause him 
some bad
> trouble if the Maximals heard them. "Take her along if you feal she 
won't be
> in the way. If more than one bot follow then split up and ditch 
her." he
> didn't want anything going wrong, they needed the help but for now 
the new
> bot was expendable.
